mapper.insert: insert into t_user_info(openid, phone, nick_name, sex, head_img, create_time) values (#{openid}, #{phone}, #{nick_name}, #{sex}, #{head_img}, #{create_time})
insert into t_evalution_info(merchant_id, comment, creator_name, creator_openid, create_time) values (#{merchant_id}, #{comment}, #{creator_name}, #{creator_openid}, #{create_time})
mapper.delete: delete from t_evalution_info where id = #{id} and creator_openid = #{openid}
